div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 975 Boljarino, c. 24 km. E of Plovdiv, Bulgaria, 1963 Burial: after 44 B.C. (T) Contents: 13+ AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 1 late post. tetradr. (Me- sembria) Maroneia: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 1 spread-flan tetradr. Imit. Thasos: 1 tetradr. Athens: 2 New Style tetradr. Roman Rep.: 7 den. (latest 44 B.C.) Disposition: Plovdiv 13 Gerasimov, BIAB 27 (1964), p. 241
